lines.text: Yeah, ok, alright, sure, just leave me alone. Do all the work. I ain't scared.
[he hears a bang and looks behind him with a frightened look on his face]
Yeah, Mo do this, Mo do that. Make him run around in tunnels and shit.

[after just hitting McQuade in the back of the head with a pipe after McQuade just hit him]
Ow, ow, ow. Does that hurt? Cuz it looks like it hurts.
You gotta tell us what's going on here. What are all these alarms for? You gotta tell us the truth, McQuade.
The Yucca Mountain Repository for High Level Atomic Waste.
Wait a minute, I thought you said that that was a mine.
Lower levels, Sub D and E is a repository.
That's right. Weapons Grade Plutonium, disabled nukes. The government has been spending a lot of time and money developing this site.
Nukes? They got nukes here? They got nukes AND dinosaurs? That's just perfect.
[rams T-rex down 200 foot hole with the forklift]
